document_data.name: O-Cho
document_data.mainbody: '''O-Cho''' was the handmaiden of [[Sumi-ko]] in [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History:
O-Cho started working for the [[Funada clan]] in [[1347 DR]].

O-Cho always supported her master, even during her illicit romance with [[Nagoya Kenko]]. However, she noticed that Kenko did not love Sumi-ko, so O-Cho told [[Funada Genzo]] about the matter and asking for help.
document_data.Personality: O-Cho considered Sumi-ko to be like a little sister in need of protection and guidance. During family difficulties, she often secretly helped Sumi-ko from behind the scenes. Her devotion was noticed and she was considered a good and loyal servant.
